name: Fungus Breeder
description:
Generate weird fungus and watch them evolve into different shapes and colors!

_________________________

HOW TO FUNGUS

Click and hold Left or Right Click on Mouse to generate Fungus.

Press P to bring up and down the Color Picker.The Color Picker allows you to change the starting color of your Fungus.

Press C to change the camera angle. You can cycle through 3 times for a high up, low down, and revolving camera.

Press Spacebar to go very slow.

_________________________
